mapper.select: SELECT id, studentID, password, name, sex, grade, photo, avatar, createTime, isPunch,user_role as userRole FROM students inner join student_role on studentID = student_role.user_id where studentID = #{studentID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (id, studentID, password, name, sex, grade, photo, avatar, createTime, isPunch) VALUES (#{id}, #{studentID}, #{password}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{grade}, #{photo}, #{avatar}, #{createTime}, #{isPunch})
